title: Director of Marketing
description: Plan and Execute marketing strategies to ensure that the club's branding stays consistent and impactful /Create visual content for various club activities for ongoing initiatives and major events /Work with the other club executives to ensure that the club'smarketing materials are accessible and uniform across different social media accounts

title: Software Development Student
description: Assisted with developing an internal website consisting of a frontend and multiple microservices /Developed a backend microservice with Golang, Gin-gonic, and GORM /Designed and architecture the front-end system to ensure scalability and efficiency. Developed the front-end using React.js and Typescript /Tested and reviewed code for failures prior to it moving into production /Consulted with clients to ensure new features met their needs and requirements

title: Software Developer
description: Worked independently and with a small team of 4 to redesign a single-paged, multi-dashboard UI as well as implement and test new features for a react-redux application /Attended and reported at daily scrums on the progress for the web application /Assisted with planning sprints for each iteration of the web application until it has made it to production /Supported web application after its release into production while working and planning the next product /Communicated closely with clients to ensure the UI/UX of the web application met their needs

title: Database Administration Coop
description: Worked with a small team of 8 to convert and migrate about 150 table spaces from a simple table space to universal table spaces on IBM z/OS mainframe /Created queries for renaming, dropping, and queries for a backup plan on all the tables in the 150 table spaces

title: Programming Instructor
description: Taught children how to apply math, physics such as vector math and trigonometry to build their own video game /Students learn good coding habits and object-oriented programming to build video games in languages like C++, Java, Visual Basics.

title: Team Lead
description: Supervised up to 10 employees to ensure easy work flow, assigned duties, and planned break times /Worked effectively in a fast paced environment providing professional service /Trained new cast members to work safely and efficiently
